name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Zip | Bulk Image Downloader for Pinterest

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for collecting and downloading Pinterest images with one click. Download multiple images at once as ZIP files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortless Pinterest Image Downloads with One Zip

Transform how you download and organize images with One Zip – the ultimate tool for quick and seamless image downloads. Designed as a sleek drag-and-drop side panel, this extension simplifies your Pinterest experience, letting you effortlessly collect, organize, and download images in bulk with just one click.

Key Features:

Drag-and-Drop Simplicity:
Easily drag as many images as you want into a folder for organized downloads.


High-Resolution Images from Thumbnails:
Automatically download full-resolution images directly from Pinterest boards—no need
to click into each pin.


One-Click Downloads:
Quickly save your curated collection as a convenient ZIP file for easy access and sharing.


Unlimited Storage:
Keep an unlimited collection of images saved for future reference.


Supports Multiple Formats:
Works with a variety of image file formats, ensuring compatibility with all your needs.


Time-Saving Efficiency:
No more downloading one image at a time—streamline your workflow with batch downloads.
